message_projection_observer: How about talking to ___ about his interest so that together you can build his projection?
message_projection_owner: How about checking with someone to help you identify what you connect with, to shape your projection?
placeholder_projection:
We want you to do what you are passionate about and what you are good at.
This is your base of what you connect with so that you can continue your journey and define the necessary actions to achieve your purpose.
Keep in mind that we promote your growth to be integral at a technical level and in the competencies of your being.
validate_text: After a skill is selected, it cannot be changed
validate_text_commitment: The estimated date of your action cannot be greater than the estimated date of your goal
goal_tooltip: What do you want to reach
action_tooltip: How do you want to reach the goal
